name: Neon Heights
description: In this 3D precision platformer jump and climb your way thorough various obstacles while trying to reach your way to the top of the level. Be sure to use all the tools and abilities you gain along the way to help aid you in reaching the goal at the end of the level. The level is also timed, so race to see if you can get the quickest time possible. But be warned, just one misstep and you'll fall your way back to the bottom. Speed and strategy is key to reaching the goal.
